task_summary: Drive the mobile robot through hallways toward the named goal location, retrying local navigation until the goal is reached and verifying arrival.

task_long_description.overview: The scene appears to be an indoor corridor sequence with a shoulder‑mounted or front‑facing camera moving past walls and fixtures, producing motion‑blurred views consistent with hallway traversal toward a destination goal point. The robot should navigate to a pre‑defined map waypoint named goal, using retries if path following is interrupted. After motion, it briefly stabilizes, then verifies arrival at the goal. No manipulation is required; only locomotion and localization checks are involved.
preconditions: Map contains a named waypoint goal
stepwise_plan: Otherwise attempt NavigateToNamed toward goal with bounded timeout
Retry navigation up to three attempts on failure or timeout
success_criteria: Final IsAt goal condition is true
failure_and_recovery: If a navigation attempt times out, immediately retry up to three attempts
If localization uncertainty is high, waiting stabilizes perception before final check
task_long_description.termination: Tree returns success once IsAt goal is true after the stabilization wait and verification.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks whether the robot is currently at the named goal.
Command the base planner to go to the named location goal with nominal heading.
Retries the navigation attempt up to three times.
Short pause to stabilize sensors before final verification.

failure_modes: Transient sensor blur causing false failure
recovery_strategy: Automatically retry navigation up to three times
Stabilization wait to improve localization before final check
assumptions: Frames are blurry corridor shots with no explicit goal marker; goal is a named map waypoint implied by the dataset rather than visually distinct
Instruction matches locomotion only; no manipulation required

expected_success_criteria: Final IsAt goal returns success after navigation and wait
